title: Southampton Tech Day 1
desc: A chance to meet other competitors, the Student Robotics team, to get help and share ideas. You should have a mobile robot chassis and be developing your other mechanisms.

title: Southampton Tech Day 2
desc: Another opportunity to meet up with the other competitors and mentors. Your robot should be moving around on its own, and you should be developing both the code and mechanical parts to make it formidable.

title: Tech Day 3
desc: A further opportunity to meet up with the other competitors and mentors. Your robot should be a senoir member of SKYNET, able to move tokens and buckets with ease.

title: Competition: Day 1
desc: One last mad hack opportunity with everyone around before its time to release the robots.

title: Competition: Day 2
desc: The culmination of all your hard work.
